summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 between FBI personnel and a CNN reporter, Mirna Alsharif, regarding a new victim who came forward alleging sexual assault by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in 1996. The email discusses verifying the existence of a 1996 FBI report and references a Miami Herald article about the victim's affidavit.

persons.name: Mirna Alsharif
persons.context: CNN reporter who emailed the FBI New York office on July 26, 2019, inquiring about verification of a 1996 FBI report regarding a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Multimillionaire financier accused of sexually assaulting a victim in 1996, as described in the victim's affidavit referenced in the email.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Epstein's companion accused of involvement in the molestation of the victim's then-15-year-old sister in 1996, according to the victim's affidavit.

connections.description: Described as companions involved in the sexual assault and molestation of a victim and her sister in 1996, according to the victim's affidavit.
Reporter investigating and seeking verification from the FBI regarding allegations against Epstein.

events.title: Alleged sexual assault by Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: A victim alleges she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein and her then-15-year-old sister was molested by Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in 1996.

events.title: CNN inquiry to FBI
events.description: CNN reporter Mirna Alsharif contacts the FBI New York office to verify the existence of a 1996 FBI report regarding a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A new victim came forward in 2019 with a sworn affidavit alleging sexual assault by Jeffrey Epstein and molestation of her sister by Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in 1996.
The victim reported her assault to the FBI in 1996, and CNN was seeking verification of this report's existence in July 2019.
The victim was employed by Epstein and observed 'school-age girls' in uniforms entering his Upper East Side mansion for what she was told were modeling auditions.
The email chain indicates internal FBI discussion about the victim and whether she appeared in their Sentinel system, referencing a 2006-2007 investigation.
